caption: This ska song features a trumpet playing the main melody. The trumpet plays one staccato note followed by a six note pattern and then plays the same sequence starting on a different root note. This is accompanied by percussion playing a simple beat. A keyboard plays chords in the background. The bass plays a groovy bassline. There are no voices in this song. This is an instrumental song. The mood of this song is happy. This song can be played in a comedy movie.
